pr_title: Add flag for when to generate routing config for tester applications

timeline.message: Add flag for -when to generate routing config for tester applications

timeline.bodyText: Normally config changes guarded by a flag would only take effect on the next (re)deploy?
timeline.author: hakonhall
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -214,6 +214,13 @@
             "Takes effect immediately",
             ZONE_ID, HOSTNAME);
 
+    public static final UnboundBooleanFlag GENERATE_ROUTING_CONFIG_FOR_TESTER_APPLICATIONS = defineFeatureFlag(
+            "generate-routing-config-for-tester-applications", true,
+            "Whether config server should generate routing config (lb-services) for tester applications",
+            "Takes effect immediately",

replies.bodyText: Yes, you are right, thanks. Fixed in #11945
replies.author: hmusum
